thread.title: Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel.

title: Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel.
text:
Dip in bank stocks is a case of short-term nervous money, says Wells Fargo's Margie Patel. 12:52am IST - 03:42 
The first three U.S. banks reporting came out with positive outlooks, says Margie Patel, senior portfolio manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. She adds, technology will set a key note for other sectors. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
The first three U.S. banks reporting came out with positive outlooks, says Margie Patel, senior portfolio manager at Wells Fargo Asset Management. She adds, technology will set a key note for other sectors. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
